LanguageData.Gun_AG1141_CP.label: Arasaka G-1141
LanguageData.Gun_AG1141_CP.description: 40mm Missile Launcher - A very rare micro-missile benifitting from a small turning circle and fast reaction to target movements. Ideal for use against armored targets.

LanguageData.Gun_MAM3_CP.label: Militech AM-3
LanguageData.Gun_MAM3_CP.description: 30mmEHI Antimatter Rifle - This 30mm rifle uses rocket-boosted, depleted-uranium 30mm shells to smash combat `borgs, powered armor, and mechanoids. Equipped with a hydro-pneumatic recoil system, advanced muzzle brake, and shock-absorbing stock and bipod. The AM-3 comes with a cyberoptic smartgun interlock and a 2-10x variable scope w/low-light and thermal-imaging options.
LanguageData.Gun_MAM3_CP.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_MAM3_CP.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_MAM3_CP.verbs.Verb_ShootCP.label: Militech AM-3
LanguageData.Gun_MBMFG_CP.label: Militech BMFG
LanguageData.Gun_MBMFG_CP.description: 30mm Plasma Cannon - Advances in electrothermal propellent technology have mad a greate many guns shoot harder and faster. Militech figured why not make a big gun fire the same, but make the gun lighter? The answer is the BMFG, a truly man-portable 30mm cannon. The cannon can not be fired from the shoulder, some sort of smart chipping is highly recommended.
LanguageData.Gun_MBMFG_CP.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_MBMFG_CP.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_MBMFG_CP.verbs.Verb_ShootCP.label: Militech BMFG
LanguageData.Gun_MM95A1_CP.label: Militech M95A1
LanguageData.Gun_MM95A1_CP.description: Railgun. In a joint venture funded by the United Military, Militech has taken the railgun conclusion another frightening step forward. 3 large electro-magnets power the weapon, and it is easily reloaded using easy to produce slugs made from ball bearings. It's only slightly larger and more cumbersome than a heavy assault rifle, though the recoil is much more severe. How they managed to make a man portable railgun this small is anyone’s guess.
LanguageData.Gun_MM95A1_CP.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_MM95A1_CP.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_MM95A1_CP.verbs.Verb_ShootCP.label: Militech M95A1
